products.title: Turin 25mm Jet Black Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Turin 25mm jet black aluminium venetian in black. Made to measure from 8.75 with free uk mainland delivery. This aluminium venetian includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away.This jet black venetian blind adds a bold black shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wooden accessories for a chic finished look.At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee. Still not sure? Why not take us up on their free sampling service, that way you can be sure your new blind is the perfect fit!

products.title: Black Gloss Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Black gloss aluminium venetian
products.productdescription: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.
